casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Stanley Ray JAMES. No. 315P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of July 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
